title: Apowersoft Video Download Capture v5.0.9 Build 28-09-15 {B4tman}
description:
Apowersoft Video Download Capture v5.0.9 Build (28-09-2015) + Key {B4tman}

 
http://s10.postimg.org/999z9jrqh/Apowersoft_Video_Download_Capture.jpg 
http://s17.postimg.org/46j33cimn/image.png

Description:-

Video Download Capture, the comprehensive tool with advanced technologies for online streaming media, offers a cost-effective choice to download videos from YouTube, Dailymotion, Vimeo, Yahoo Screen, and Hulu, as well as millions of other websites.

This powerful and productive video downloader can download and save videos, movies, TV episodes and music videos online, automatically. It also features conversion functions, which support to convert any video to MP4, AVI, MKV, WMV and other popular formats. In addition, the inlaid screen recorder is capable of recording live video streams with great ease.

Features:-

Easy Video Download with Great Speed:-

Video Download Capture adopts the most advanced software technology where online videos will be auto-detected and added to download. Batch video download is a cinch to this effective download manager.

Support Various Kinds of Streaming Media Protocols and Video Sites:-

Superior tool to download online videos that are streamed by HTTP, FTP, RTMP and other multimedia transferring protocols. Thus, you are allowed to get infinite video resources from YouTube, Dailymotion, Myspace, Hulu, ABC and many more.

Able to Record Live Streaming Videos:-

The screen recording function is prepared for capturing internet live videos, video conferences, chats and online video courses. In addition, Video Download Capture is a quick way to create homemade videos.

Download Videos in High Definition:-

Video Download Capture empowers you to download online TV shows and video clips in several formats and resolution. The downloaded videos will keep its original video quality.

Embed a Powerful Video Converter Inside:-

Built-in video converter delivers incredible performance with a rich feature set, and conveniently converts online videos to commonly-used formats, such as MP4, FLV, MKV, or AVI for media players, iPhone, iPad, PSP, and Zune playback.

Handy Toolkits for Extensive Uses:-

Simple video editing function facilitates you to do basic edits, such as crop, trim and insert subtitles. The smart built-in player is able to play any online videos without hassle.

Powerful Built-in Video Player:-

Video Download Capture has its own media player, which saves you trouble in playing the downloaded video files, or videos already stored on your PC
